net.corda.testing.dsl

Interface LedgerDSLInterpreter<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OutputStateLookup, Verifies
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LedgerDSL, TestLedgerDSLInterpreter

    @DoNotImplement
public LedgerDSLInterpreter<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter>
extends Verifies, OutputStateLookup

    This interface defines the bare bone functionality that a Ledger DSL interpreter should implement.

    TODO (Kotlin 1.1): Use type synonyms to make the type params less unwieldy

        @NotNull
net.corda.core.transactions.WireTransaction _transaction(@Nullable
                                                                  java.lang.String transactionLabel,
                                                                  @NotNull
                                                                  net.corda.core.transactions.TransactionBuilder transactionBuilder,
                                                                  @NotNull
                                                                  kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,? extends net.corda.testing.dsl.EnforceVerifyOrFail> dsl)

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
        Returns:
        The final WireTransaction of the built transaction.

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger that will not be verified by verifies.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
        Returns:
        The final WireTransaction of the built transaction.
        See Also:

        Adds an attachment to the ledger.
